name: Classic Cheeseburger
description: A timeless favorite with a juicy beef patty, melted cheese, crisp lettuce, ripe tomatoes, onions, and pickles.

name: Bacon BBQ Burger
description: A mouthwatering delight featuring a beef patty topped with crispy bacon, tangy barbecue sauce, melted cheese, and caramelized onions.

name: Spicy Chicken Burger
description: A fiery treat packed with a seasoned chicken patty, spicy mayo, lettuce, and pickles, served in a soft bun.

name: Mushroom Swiss Burger
description: An irresistible combination of a juicy beef patty, saut√©ed mushrooms, melted Swiss cheese, and a hint of tangy mayo.

name: Veggie Burger
description: A wholesome plant-based delight featuring a flavorful vegetable patty, fresh lettuce, tomatoes, onions, and a zesty sauce.

name: BBQ Ranch Chicken Burger
description: A delectable combination of grilled chicken, smoky BBQ sauce, creamy ranch dressing, lettuce, and crispy onions.

name: Garden Veggie Burger
description: A delicious veggie patty made with a blend of fresh garden vegetables, served with crisp lettuce, ripe tomatoes, and tangy sauce.

name: Mediterranean Burger
description: A mouthwatering falafel patty infused with Mediterranean spices, topped with fresh veggies, tahini sauce, and served on a warm bun.

name: Portobello Burger
description: Grilled portobello mushrooms marinated in savory herbs and spices, layered with melted cheese, caramelized onions, and served on a soft bun.

name: Classic Beef Burger
description: A classic beef patty cooked to perfection, topped with melted cheese, crisp lettuce, juicy tomatoes, and a special tangy sauce.
